title: Can someone ban me please?
body: Like seriously, can someone ban my account from this game? Id rather not have a stroke in the future. I've only spent like $500 in this game anyways so its not like its a lot. Not a perm ban, but like a year or something. I'm just tired of the bullshit and i want to be done with it.

replies.body:
> I've only spent like $500 in this game anyways so its not like its a lot



Dude. That sounds like a lot.

As odd as this may be, you are not the first one who has requested this!  There might be something we can do to help out, but first you'll need to [submit us a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).

Sit tight, and we'll take care of it.

Dudes thankfully you don't just do it, I left my browser open and a friend of mine posted this without my knowledge. Got on to read the patch notes and noticed this lol. Thank you guys for the good work on not instantly banning someone!
